Would you like to exit the game?
TankBattle game has very simple rules. You can play the game in either portrait or landscape mode, although landscape mode is recommended.
The tank is controlled through a joystick and will move in the direction the joystick is dragged.

Tap the SHOOT button to fire a high-speed projectile in the direction your tank is currently facing. Hitting an opponent will reduce their health points (HP). When a HP of the tank reaches 0, it is eliminated.
Click the exit button to return to the main menu. Doing so will immediately eliminate your tank.
Now that you know how to play, go battle some tanks!
